title: Assignment_1
text:
This assignment is the result of a process that started with much skepticism about it’s feasability but (touch wood) seems to be nearing its end. This visual editor thing feels kind of like Notion, from my limited computer knowledge I’m guessing they both use markdown somehow. Seems powerful if one learns to use it.


Code
# Load the iris dataset

data(iris)

# Create a scatterplot

plot(iris$Sepal.Length, iris$Sepal.Width,
col = iris$Species,
pch = 19,
main = "Iris Sepal Length vs Width",
xlab = "Sepal Length",
ylab = "Sepal Width")

# Add a legend

legend("topright", legend = levels(iris$Species),
col = 1:3, pch = 19, title = "Species")















Disclaimer: The code was created with the help of AI.
